title: Ranked rewards rollout
body: Do the rewards begin to roll out today? or is there a couple days before they start rolling out

replies.body: Rewards are currently being rolled out. I think  the patch will be released in the next couple days. (Heard the 9th from a few sources)
Key word here being **rolled**, not all rewards are going to hit at the same time. Some players may be waiting up to two weeks.
Wednesday's is patch day normally, so 9th would be accurate (unless a major bug is found, then occasionally the patches are delayed.)
